product.name: Fluffy Stuffed Animal Storage Bean Bag Chair Cover (No Filler), Faux Fur Comfy Bean Bag Cover for Organizing Plush Toys or Textile, for Adults Teens Kids Girls, Gray
product.bullet_points:
• Faux Fur
• Friendly Fabric Material: Crafted from high-quality shaggy plush faux fur, this shaggy bean bag cover offers an unparalleled sense of luxury. Its resistance to fading, shedding, wrinkles, and pilling ensures it will stay looking great for a long time.The comfortable bean bag is supposed to be the best-loved place for you and your children,also can be your pets bed.
• Product Idea: The bean bag chair has a capacity of 300L of stuffing For Large Size，100L For Small Size. If you do not have efficient plastic foam, you can encourage children to collect old stuffed toys, old pillows and clean old clothes to stuff inside, making them complete this special and meaningful mission, which is environment-friendly and reduces garbage disposal for the purpose of turning into an environmentalist.
• Various Colors: For this fluffy bean bag chair cover, we offer a wide range of colors for you to choose from, satisfying your diverse needs to complement any room decor. It's a versatile choice for all seasons and makes for a perfect gift for occasions like birthdays, Children's Day, Christmas, New Year's Day, and more.
• Packge:1* bean bag stuffed animal storage
